# deps/skia/src/gpu

set(SKIA_GPU_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/gpu")
set(SKIA_GPU_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/gpu")

file(GLOB SKIA_GPU_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_GPU_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_GPU_SOURCES "${SKIA_GPU_DIR}/*.cpp")
file(GLOB SKIA_GPU_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_GPU_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_GPU_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_GPU_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_GPU_SOURCES})

set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
